Text: Actually, I happen to have many other rare, hard to come by, digital books on many subjects, but in view of the lack of comments and expressed appreciation here, maybe I should keep them to myself.

No, by all means, please share what you have. My feeling is that this is the true spirit of TPB, that we share what we value. And thanks for this volume. Have a hardbound copy, but always try to have a digital copy of my books to read also.

Don't pout buddy. The appreciation will come in time. Just keep them coming. 

Thank you for the upload. :)
I am a very thorough and meticulous searcher of the internet and keen on finding these very little known but significant bits of important evidence. I am glad some appreciate my efforts.
Don't waste your time. This book is half a century old, and tons of research has been done since then.

True, but you forget that he was a journalist in Germany between 1934 and 1941, so he had first hand info on many things, besides being a very entertaining and reliable writer who covered practically all sides of the equation. That's why it is still today a bestseller.
